title: Scorpions - World Wide Live (1985) [FLAC] {2015 Reissue + DVD}
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                               World Wide Live (1985)
              {50th Anniversary Deluxe and Remastered Edition, 2015}                  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: Scorpions
 Musicians:

    Rudolf Schenker - rhythm guitar, lead guitar, backing vocals
    Klaus Meine - vocals, rhythm guitar 
    Matthias Jabs - lead guitars, rhythm guitars, voice-box, backing vocals
    Francis Buchholz - bass, backing vocals
    Herman Rarebell - drums, backing vocals

 Title: World Wide Live 
 Genre: Hard Rock / Heavy Metal
 Label: BMG
 Released: 2015
 Originally Released: 1985
 Cat #: 538159522
 Artists Country: Germany
 Release Country: Germany
 Source: CDDA
 Audio Codec: FLAC (.flac) 
 CD Format: tracks / .cue / log / complete artwork 
 DVD Format: .iso / decrypter log

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 DVD Specs:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Video:
 MPEG-2 Video / NTSC / 720x480 / 4:3 / 7400 kbps / 29.970 fps
 
 Audio:
 PCM / 1536 kbps / 2 ch / 48.0 kHz / 16 bits
